The tuple/replace.hpp header defines macros to replace an element in an array.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/tuple/replace.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REPLACE (v)
  • BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REPLACE_D (v)
